description: This file defines a data transfer object (DTO) class 'ProductResponse' used for representing product information in API responses, including annotations for Swagger/OpenAPI documentation.

classes.name: ProductResponse
classes.description: A POJO class representing the product data to be sent in API responses, with schema annotations for documentation.

methods.name: ProductResponse(Long id, String name, BigDecimal price, Integer quantity)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing all fields of ProductResponse.
